promotions.detailed_marketing_blurb: Well, well, well! Who do we have here? Step right up to the stall folks, and see what we have here for you today! Interested in sporting a VR headset to enjoy some fantastic, mind-blowing virtual experiences? Do we have the bundle for you! From zombie-smashing and rifle-shooting, to house flipping and more, there are plenty of activities to get your heart racing and your brow a-sweating! Why not hop on into games like Arizona Sunshine, Zero Caliber VR, and Until You Fall? It’s all for a good cause, as your purchase helps support a charity of your choice!
promotions.short_marketing_blurb: Step right up, and play great VR games!

promotions.detailed_marketing_blurb: We’re not sure Team17 has ever made a bad game. My Time at Portia? Awesome. Overcooked! 2? Plenty of fun, either alone or with friends. Worms Rumble? Who doesn’t enjoy a worms-based battle royale?! See what we mean? You will when you grab the Team17 Greatest Hits Bundle, packed with some of the studio’s best games. And while you’re enjoying yourself, you can enjoy knowing your purchase benefits a charity of your choice!
promotions.short_marketing_blurb: The biggest hits and bits by Team17!

promotions.detailed_marketing_blurb: Step beyond the limits of the silver screen and join Insight Editions in our newest bundle, a Gringott’s vault filled with the complete Harry Potter Film Vault collection! Discover the makings of the movies, everything from magical creatures to props and more. 12 in-depth volumes will ensure you’re the ultimate wizarding whizz, and there’s even the Harry Potter: Knitting Magic book included - in case you feel like creating some memorabilia to show your house pride! Your Potterific purchase helps support NatureBridge!

promotions.detailed_marketing_blurb: You’ve no doubt heard of Telltale games; The Walking Dead, Batman, The Wolf Among Us? We’re sure at least one of those is ringing a bell. Well, we’ve got good news. Our new bundle, aptly titled Humble Telltale Games Bundle, includes all of them, the complete series!. That means when you pick up this bundle, you’ll enjoy the entire story of The Walking Dead, The Wolf Among Us, and Telltale's Batman! And while you’re living those stories, your purchase helps support a charity of your choice!

promotions.detailed_marketing_blurb: Let’s face it. It can get boring being a goody-two-shoes in games all the time. Sometimes, you need to let off steam. Sometimes, you need to be the bad guy, duh. That’s exactly what this bundle’s all about; being good at being bad. That’s why we’ve put together a bunch of games including Dungeons III, Mafia: 2 Definitive Edition, and Mafia: 3 Definitive Edition! While you’re letting off steam and being the villain, your purchase helps support a charity of your choice!

promotions.detailed_marketing_blurb: What if there were ways to speed things up, make progress faster, or save yourself some time? Struggle to sleep, focus, learn? What about something more serious, like surviving dangerous situations or reducing stress? Life hacks. We’ve heard the term before, but now it’s time to put words into action with our new bundle! Adams Media is delivering a shocking wealth of life hacks to help you get the drop on life, with guides like Life Hacks, Survival Hacks, College Hacks, and Brain Hacks. Plus, your purchase helps support a charity of your choice!
promotions.tile_name: Humble Book Bundle: Life Hacks by Adams Media

promotions.marketing_blurb: Get Managing Apps on Kubernetes with Istio, Docker and Kubernetes: The Big Picture, Kubernetes for Developers: Core Concepts, Getting Started with Google Kubernetes Engine, Kubernetes for Developers: Moving to the Cloud, and more!
promotions.detailed_marketing_blurb: Kubernetes (also known as k8s or “kube” if the word’s making your eyes go funny) is an open source container platform that helps automate various processes in relation to deploying, managing, and scaling containerized apps! Pretty handy if you’re a developer, huh? Pluralsight certainly seems to think so, which is why they’ve teamed up with us to bring you a whole curriculum of knowledge on Kubernetes, with software like Why Kubernetes, Getting Started with Google Kubernetes Engine, and Kubernetes for Developers: Core Concepts.  And while you’re mastering “Kube”, you’ll be supporting Girls Who Code & Code.org!
promotions.tile_name: Humble Software Bundle: Kubernetes with Pluralsight
promotions.short_marketing_blurb: Automate, scale, and manage with Kubernetes!
